title: Tsiamelo: a place of goodness
creator_credit: Betty Wolpert, Zweites Deutsches Fernsehen, Ellen Kuzwayo and Blanche Tsimatsima
brief_description: A remarkable and sensitive film dealing with the reality of racial segregation in South Africa by showing us how a single family and their friends have been affected by the 1913 Native Land Act and subsequent laws.
